You can write your topic however you want, but you need to answer these questions:

I have a script that adds a point part to the leaderstats, and it works with the change command on basic admin essentials. It also gives a point per item given to NPC but I need the points to stay and not disappear every time I rejoin the game. Any advice on how to accomplish this?

You need to script something called a DataStore. It allows you to keep your player’s data when they rejoin.

I’d suggest you watch this helpful tutorial:
Data Stores - Roblox Scripting Tutorial

Make an ordered data store or a normal data store. There is a lot of tutorials out there in the internet.
Example: Roblox Documentation
https://create.roblox.com/docs/cloud-services/data-stores
